text: “Ibyo musenga mu cyimbo cye (Allah) ni amazina masa (adafite icyo avuze) mwihimbiye; mwe n’abakurambere banyu, nyamara Allah atarigeze abibahera uburenganzira. Nta wundi ukwiye gutanga itegeko (ry’ukwiye gusengwa) usibye Allah. Yategetse ko nta kindi mugomba kugaragira uretse We wenyine. Iryo ni ryo dini ritunganye, nyamara abenshi mu bantu ntibabizi.”
